channel.title: {317}reaper-pkz customs! w00t[317] my first source coded
channel.description:
tired of people taking credit for what the reaper x mod allstar and i like 20% created xD ive got spammed bye so many servers with this source.... then i logon and it says owner and full coder owner josh has logged on and shit damn what is the point in me posting this shit up if someone else is gonan take credit for it... fuck that !
[size=30pt]CLOSE!!! PLEASE!?!?[/size]

item.title: {317}reaper-pkz customs! w00t[317] my first source coded
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Pker1 Teh Pker
item.description:
@Teh_Pker1 wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:31, topic:295951”][quote author=Teh Pker link=topic=391980.msg2920547#msg2920547 date=1250721158]

So you just admitted you were wrong?

dude dont be mad cuz ur on a sucky source and ur mad cuz this one is better then urs… its his first time posting source so give him a break… u should be pretty smart cuz it looks like ur pretty experenced with ur rep 200…
[/quote]

You just won a place on my losers list.[quote author=Teh Pker link=topic=391980.msg2920589#msg2920589 date=1250723367]

tired of people taking credit for what the reaper x mod allstar and i like 20% created xD ive got spammed bye so many servers with this source… then i logon and it says owner and full coder owner josh has logged on and shit damn what is the point in me posting this shit up if someone else is gonan take credit for it… fuck that
!

yeah well ur right… we did get spammed so much… and there like 3 servers atm that im spamming for spamming us…
[/quote]

If you allow spammers to enter the server and you have no way of stopping them it’s your fault. Rather than spamming them back and acheiving nothing why not get a decent Ip ban. Do the thread fix and code your server better so that it wont crash.[/quote]

Yeah dude… we have kept spamming dead…

V3 is almost out… now…

Client background has been changed and the main load up background is much better.

Read full topic

item.source: {317}reaper-pkz customs! w00t[317] my first source coded

item.title: {317}reaper-pkz customs! w00t[317] my first source coded
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“airforce711, post:9, topic:295951”][quote author=the1337legend link=topic=391980.msg2918401#msg2918401 date=1250615532]

nice I Like It;)

thanks, Its my first time… and i caught on to java pretty fast i would say its accualy easy once you get the hang of it

-sorry for my bad grammar haha-

sorry to burst your bubble but you didn’t do anything related to coding using java language, you just changed numbers
[/quote]

what… i added fricken tons of commands and items… voule commands generator wouldnt work i used no tutorials at all and the only numbers i changed was for objects and npcs… wich was easy. lemme think i added alot of things related to java anyway. just cant think of it atm.

k thx BAI![/quote]

Please don’t get cocky. This is alright for a first time but if you think this is coding sadly you are wrong. Legend is correct all you have done is copy and paste and change a few numbers.(Don’t worry I would say that is what about 80% of moparscapers do)

Never would I consider coding adding commands(Copy and paste with slight mod), changing numbers (E.g teleports Etc), adding some sendQuests (Which you haven’t even done) or adding custom items. Considering there are a million tuts on how, you didn’t work out how to do it in the first place, and its still just copy and paste.

If for instance you had used a void and a switch statement when adding the custom items and possibly used a handler for it. Then I would allow you to say you coded the server.

Speaking of Voids and Switch Statements and Handlers for item loading I might just go and do that…

Read full topic

but there might be a home in v3 so no worries mate

yes i got bad grammar and im sorry…
